Comment.Language: The priests kiss one another with a holy kiss, as do the deacons and the congregation. Then the priest and the deacon who stands opposite to him raise the prospheron. (The raising of the prospheron is a symbol of the angel moving the stone from the tomb after the resurrection.)

Text.Language: A mercy of peace, a sacrifice of praise.
